fields.headline: Southern Softies
fields.bodyText: Even those who regard John Shuttleworth as a charming, avuncular presence will find their patience taxed by this interminable travelogue, in which Sheffield's finest visits the Channel Islands to test the moral and physical fibre of its citizens. I'm not sure the southerners he meets are "soft", exactly. Mostly they just seem bemused, uninterested and mildly embarrassed to be on camera.
